transcript: why do you think life needs to be meaningful it does it right so if you get some days that mean more awesome if you dab days that don't awesome my favorite analogy is the sunshine and Rain which is like we say Sunshine days or good days rainy days or bad days but it's just weather yeah and if you're a fish maybe rainy days are good and sunshine days are bad yeah so it's just what you make it mean if you make it mean different things and it means you can make anything mean anything which then means you're in control which is what I ultimately wanted was like I see Freedom as being able to just choose how you want to experience life
